Passaic.Straight Street Bridge:
Straight Street Bridge is a vehicular bridge over the Passaic River in Paterson, New Jersey.


== Original construction and description ==
The single span Pennsylvania (petit) truss bridge on brownstone ashlar abutments. It was completed in 1907, using the substructure which had been built for an earlier bridge that had washed away in Passaic River Flood of 1903.
